definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: The lazy man was a parasite on his family.
sentences.chinese: 那懶漢是家裏的寄生蟲。

sentences.english: Seryozhka is a sluggard, a drunkard.
sentences.chinese: 謝遼日卡是個懶漢，酒鬼。

sentences.english: "Stand up and repeat" 'This is the voice of the sluggard, 'said the gryphon.
sentences.chinese: “站起來背《這是懶漢在說話》，”鷹首師身怪說。

sentences.english: You idler, go to the ant, watch her ways and be wise.
sentences.chinese: 懶漢，你去看看螞蟻，觀察牠的作風，便可得些智識。

sentences.english: He is a lazy man still riding on his father's coattails.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個仍然依靠父親幫助的懶漢。

sentences.english: Can you help me, you fat slob?
sentences.chinese: 你能幫我嗎，你這個肥胖的懶漢？

sentences.english: An idle brain is the devil's workshop.
sentences.chinese: 懶漢的頭腦是魔鬼的旅遊管理考研工廠。

sentences.english: His effort on the defensive end of the floor will make Richard Jefferson look like a sloth.
sentences.chinese: 他在防守端的努力會讓傑佛森看起來就像個懶漢一樣。

sentences.english: Go to the ant, O sluggard, and consider her ways, and learn wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 懶漢，你去看看螞蟻，觀察牠的作風，便可得些智識。

sentences.english: Draw a circle idlers also get a month's time.
sentences.chinese: 懶漢畫一個圓圈也得一個月的時間。

sentences.english: Plough deep, while sluggards sleep; and you have corn to sell and to keep.
sentences.chinese: 懶漢睡覺你學耕，保你糧倉滿騰騰。

sentences.english: We make the busy bee look like a lazy creature, the ant like a sluggard.
sentences.chinese: 我們令蜜蜂顯得懶惰，令螞蟻看上去像懶漢。

sentences.english: Her boyfriend is a good - for - nothing layabout.
sentences.chinese: 她的男友是一個一無是處的懶漢。

sentences.english: The rich would have spoken on the value of thrift, and the idle grown eloquent over the dignity of labour.
sentences.chinese: 富人會談論節儉的價值，懶漢則侈談勞動光榮。

sentences.english: You say slacktivism, I say economies of scale.
sentences.chinese: 有人說這是懶漢行動主義，我說它是規模經濟。

sentences.english: A learned man is an idler who kills time by study. ----Bernard Shaw.
sentences.chinese: 博學的人是用學習消磨時間的懶漢。
